main event: A witness reported seeing a bright silvery colored object in Kansas, Ohio, on June 8, 1952, which traveled southeast before disappearing into the clouds.
interesting points: The object appeared motionless at times., The witness initially thought it was a private aircraft but later realized it wasn't., There was no physical evidence of the object's presence., The sighting lasted for an estimated 15 minutes., The witness did not see any markings or components like wings on the object.
witness description: A 45-year-old male, a veteran of World War II with experience as a photographer and radio operator.
